overview: Called up for jury duty, Richard Dice finds his first crush and only real, but unrequited love, on trial for murder. Richard desperately tries to prove Mollys innocence while untangling a complicated web of murder, blackmail and perjury, and still trying to win over the girl of his dreams.
tagline: A girl on her way to being convicted. A smitten juror who's really conflicted. A lawless affair that's totally restricted.
title: Illegally Yours
